name: Winter Train: Snowplow Mission
description:
Control a mighty train with Winter Train. Feel like a true train driver, make a trip to the snow lands of Canada. Canadian winter is nearly as severe as Russian. A lot of snow and ice on the roads.

Your mission here is to clear the huge snowdrifts in one of the train lines. Be prepared for the hard drive.

Start your way from the railway station in Canada;
Control a big and mighty snow plow train;
Clear away snow piles on your way;
Arrive at the terminal station.

Winter Train game key Features:
Exciting snow plowing mission;
Fascinating railroad adventure;
Chance to control a mighty train;
Beautiful snowy landscapes on the way.

Winter Train is a great opportunity to complete a hard mission and admire wonderful Canadian lands!
